name: YellowFeverTestsForYellowFeverVirusIgMAntibody
title: Yellow Fever (Tests for yellow fever virus IgM Antibody)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Yellow Fever Virus IgM Antibody),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Yellow Fever Virus IgM Antibody;  

LOINC search:  yellow fever virus IgM Ab -Japanese -Nile -Tick),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
